Banco de Desenvolvimento de Angola (English: Development Bank of Angola) (BDA) is the public bank of Angola to finance investments in "strategic long-term economic development" of the country
E guzobere ya na July 2006 site na iwu gọọmentị No

BDA na-elekọta Fundo Nacional de Desenvolvimento - FND (National Development Fund - NDF) nke a na-enye site na 5% nke nsonaazụ mmefu ego nke ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ala nke Angola na 2% nke nsonaazụ mmefu ego nke ọrụ diamond nke Angola.
N'afọ 2008, ụlọ akụ ahụ kwadoro ọrụ ruru ijeri Kwanza 8.7, nke kwekọrọ na ihe dịka $ 116 nde US.
